top_questions.text: Convert or Calculate as per the instructions. [4×1=4] i) (11101010101)₂= (?)₁₆​ ii) (555)₈=(?)₁₀​ iii) (11110)₂ + (1100)₂-(1000)₂​ iv) (10110)₂÷(101)₂
Write a C Program that takes principal, rate and time as input and calculate the simple interest. [4] OR Write a program in C-Language to display first 10 natural numbers.

Write a program in Q-BASIC that asks first term, common Difference and No. of terms of a arithmetic series and calculate its general term and sum. Create a Function procedure to calculate general term and sub procedure to calculate sum. [4]​ [Hint:- tn = a+[(n-1)×d] and Sn = n/2 [2a+(n-1)×d]]
